title: PRICE REDUCED - T206 Cy Young (Bare Hand Shows)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: PRICE REDUCED - T206 Cy Young (Bare Hand Shows)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Cy Young in G+ condition.  The card exhibits a few surface wrinkles and has a small wrinkle on the left border.  It is also off-center left-to-right, but has bold colors and great eye appeal.

$365 paypal gift (shipping is on me).  First to PM me or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it" will be the new owner.

See scans below for condition.

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/T206_Young.jpg[/IMG][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/T206_Young_back.jpg[/IMG]

bump for final price reduction...would love to sell it raw to a forum member, otherwise it's off to a TPG.  Don't let this card get entombed!  

I believe it has breathed fresh air its entire life...
